resources.string: \ + Galaxy Watch速 sync functionality added by Vascomax
Created random password for data exchange with tizOTP on Galaxy Watch速: \n\n
You have to enter it on the Galaxy Watch速 during tizOTP setup.\nIt will be stored here as default andOTP \

Provide additional encrypted 1-way bluetooth updates to WearOS watch (e.g. GW4). Effective only after app restart.
